summary.para: Contains the total number of bytes that should be allocated for a file. This structure is used when calling the function.

remarks.para: The end-of-file (EOF) position for a file must always be less than or equal to the file allocation size. If the allocation size is set to a value that is less than EOF, the EOF position is automatically adjusted to match the file allocation size.

summary.para: The new file allocation size, in bytes. This value is typically a multiple of the sector or cluster size for the underlying physical device.
